= Task 2 =
{{{
Fib = {1, 1};
T = 0;
For[i = 2, i < 1000, i++, 
 Fib[[Mod[i + 1, 2] + 1]] = Fib[[1]] + Fib[[2]]; 
 x = Fib[[Mod[i + 1, 2] + 1]];
 If[x >= 4000000, Break[]];
 If[Mod[x, 2] == 0, T += x]]
T
}}}
4613732

= Task 4 =
{{{
p = 0;
For[i = 10, i < 1000, i++,
  For[j = 10, j < 1000, j++, x = i*j; 
   If[x > p && ToString[x] == StringReverse[ToString[x]], p = x]]];
p
}}}
